settings.message_text: MADE IN USA | FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE US AND CANADA

settings.title: Where it all begins
settings.text: Grown from sustainable forestry plantations, beech trees multiply by rejuvenation. That means the trees propagate by themselves and there is no artificial irrigation or planting required. Beechwood forests are 100% sustainable. This process allows us to bring the softest fabric on Earth to your closet. Our Bleusalt fabric, made from beechwood, is entirely vegan and cruelty-free.

settings.title: Packaging
settings.subtitle: Packaging
settings.text: BLEUSALT is proudly working towards being fully zero-waste. We ship using recyclable boxes and never use any plastic. We offer custom gift bags made from our fabric remnants for an added special touch, available as an add-on on every product page.

Home of The Bleusalt Wrap and elevated basics that make dressing stylish and simple.  Each piece made from the softest fibers on earth - BLEUSALT was created out of an authentic need for beautifully designed clothing that has the luxurious quality and softness of Cashmere without the preciousness and high price point. Born from the beaches of Malibu, BLEUSALT is a curated collection cultivated from the sustainable botanic fibers of the beech tree. Each signature item is 100% made in the USA.

We took the comfort of athleisure and the softest fibers on Earth to create a collection of luxurious, classic pieces for your everyday wardrobe. BLEUSALT is a collection of essentials that are unmatched in softness and can be worn as seasonless additions to your wardrobe.

Founder and Designer Lyndie Benson created BLEUSALT out of her own desire for luxurious clothing that epitomized comfort-chic but left minimal impact on the Earth. Inspired by the ocean and nature, BLEUSALT is a complete lifestyle brand that brings the coveted Malibu way of living to your closet. We believe Malibu is a lifestyle; not a destination.
BLEUSALT is proudly working towards being fully zero-waste. We believe in being part of the solution. We believe in luxury, style, and unmatched comfort.

settings.title: Where​ ​does​ ​the​ ​name​ ​Bleusalt​ ​come​ ​from?
settings.text: The​ ​name​ ​Bleusalt ​was​ ​inspired​ ​by​ ​the​ ​ocean.​ ​We​ ​are​ ​a​ ​brand​ ​born​ ​from​ ​the​ ​beaches​ ​of Malibu.​ ​

settings.title: What​ ​was​ ​the​ ​inspiration​ ​behind​ ​the​ ​brand?
settings.text: Bleusalt ​was​ ​created​ ​out​ ​of​ ​our​ ​founder​ ​Lyndie​ ​Benson’s​ ​Malibu​ ​lifestyle​ ​in​ ​and​ ​around​ ​the ocean​ ​and​ ​a​ ​desire​ ​for​ ​comfortable​ ​yet​ ​chic​ ​attire​ ​that​ ​works​ ​day​ ​to​ ​night​ ​and​ ​in​ ​most​ ​situations. It’s​ ​a​ ​life​ ​well-lived​ ​in​ ​Malibu​ ​with​ ​the​ ​emphasis​ ​on​ ​life​ ​and​ ​living​ ​to​ ​the​ ​fullest.​ ​We​ ​believe​ ​Malibu is​ ​not​ ​really​ ​a​ ​destination,​ ​but​ ​a​ ​lifestyle.​ ​We​ ​want​ ​you​ ​to​ ​have​ ​a​ ​little​ ​piece​ ​of​ ​Malibu​ ​every time ​you wear​ Bleusalt.

settings.title: Every item of Bleusalt is made from the same sustainable fabric. Why did you choose to focus the brand around the fabric?
settings.text: Prior​ ​to​ ​discovering​ ​our​ ​beechwood fabric,​ ​we​ ​loved​ ​Cashmere.​ ​However,​ ​Cashmere​ ​is​ ​too​ ​hot, sticky,​ ​and​ ​precious​ ​to​ ​withstand​ ​the​ ​elements​ ​at​ ​the​ ​beach.​ ​We​ ​combined​ ​the​ ​softest​ ​fibers​ ​on Earth​ ​with​ ​beautiful​ ​classic​ ​styles​ to create a​ ​collection​ ​of​ ​luxurious​ ​pieces​ ​for​ ​your​ ​every​​day wardrobe.​ ​What​ ​we​ ​have​ ​developed​ ​is​ ​the​ ​most​ ​amazing,​ ​comfortable,​ ​sustainable,​ ​and​ ​softest fabric​ ​in​ ​the​ ​world.

settings.title: Where​ ​does​ ​your​ ​fabric​ ​come​ ​from? What is beechwood?
settings.text: Before we create our own luxurious blends of beechwood locally in Los Angeles, we source the best of the best sustainable fibers, called Lenzing Modal. Lenzing is known for revolutionizing the fashion industry thanks to their sustainable harvesting methods and dedication to producing fibers in an environmentally sound way to minimize the impact on our Earth. The fibers are ​developed​ ​from​ ​the​ ​sustainable​ ​botanic​ ​fibers​ ​of​ ​the​ ​beech tree​ ​to​ ​create​ ​the most uniquely soft fabric. Once you feel it, you’re hooked.

settings.title: Are your clothes truly the softest fibers on Earth?
settings.text: Yes, our signature beechwood fabric really is softer than anything you have felt before. The unique and unmatched softness of our fabric has been proven by a special method that evaluates softness of fabrics called the Kawabata Evaluation System (KES), developed by a team led by Professor Kawabata at Kyoto University.

settings.title: Why do some of my Bleusalt pieces feel different than other pieces?
settings.text: The beechwood fabric varies due to the organic nature of its fibers, as well as the different methods of dying different colors. Each color is created slightly differently. There can variation from time to time and from color to color. However, it is our number one priority to continue to improve and to offer you the best possible quality fabric.

settings.title: Where​ ​are​ ​all​ ​of​ ​your​ ​products​ ​made?
settings.text: All​ ​of​ ​our​ ​products​ ​are​ ​made​ ​in​ ​the​ ​USA,​ ​in​ ​Hollywood, just an hour away from our Malibu HQ… when there’s no traffic.

settings.title: How​ ​do​ ​I​ ​care​ ​for​ ​my​ ​Bleusalt?
settings.text:
Machine washing and drying your Bleusalt is completely fine.

However, if you would prefer to take extra care of your garments, machine wash delicate with like colors and choose the lowest heat setting and/or the delicate setting on your drying machine. You may even lightly steam your items to retain the shape.

settings.title: Can​ ​I​ ​get​ ​my​ ​Bleusalt ​wet?​ ​Will​ ​it​ ​dry​ ​quickly?
settings.text: We​ ​designed​ ​Bleusalt ​to​ ​take​ ​with​ ​you​ ​everywhere.​ ​Throw​ ​your​ ​Bleusalt ​on​ ​the​ ​sand without​ ​worrying​ ​about​ ​the​ ​fabric​ ​getting​ ​sticky.​ ​Although​ ​Bleusalt ​is​ ​not​ ​quick-dry or water resistant,​ ​it​ ​can​ ​get wet.

settings.title: Can​ ​I​ ​shop​ ​Bleusalt ​in​ ​person?
settings.text: Yes, you can. Through August 31st 2019, we have a POP UP in Malibu at 3939 Crosscreek Road, Malibu, CA 90265.

settings.title: Will​ ​you​ ​be​ ​launching​ ​any​ ​new​ ​colors?
settings.text: Yes! As we grow, we will continue to expand our color options. More classic and elegant neutrals are launching this Fall 2018, including the long-awaited Black. ​Have​ ​a​ ​color​ ​in mind​ ​you​ ​would​ ​love​ ​to​ ​add​ ​to​ ​your​ ​Bleusalt ​wardrobe?​ ​Email​ ​us​ ​at customercare@bleusalt.com​

settings.title: Have questions about our shipping or return and exchange policies?
settings.text: SEE MORE HERE.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.text: Yes, we offer complimentary ground shipping via UPS within the United States and Canada.

settings.title: How long does shipping take?
settings.text: All orders placed within the United States will be delivered within 3-5 business days (unless otherwise noted on specific products). Please allow for up to 24 hours for your order to be processed. You will receive an email as soon as your order goes out for shipping.

settings.title: I can't wait to wear my Bleusalt! Can I get it sooner?
settings.text: Of course! For US customers, expedited shipping (2-3 business days) is available for $20.00 and overnight shipping (1-2 business days) is available for $50.00. For Canada, expedited shipping (2-3 business days) is available for $40.00. Just select the option you prefer at checkout.

settings.title: Can I make a return or exchange?
settings.text:
We want you to love your Bleusalt and have it fit perfectly. For the US and Canada, you have 30 days from your order date to request a return or exchange. We make it easy for you and include a return label in every package. Simply mail your items back to us with a note requesting a return or an exchange, specifying which new items you would like. All items must be unworn in original condition. If for some reason your package did not include a return label or if you have any questions about your order, please email us at customercare@bleusalt.com and be sure to include your order number.

Once we receive your item(s), we will immediately refund the card used or ship you your replacement items.

At this time, all purchases from international countries are final sale. We do not offer free returns and exchanges outside of the US and Canada.

settings.title: Can I order outside of the United States?
settings.text: Yes! We ship worldwide. Currently, shipping is complimentary for North America. We charge a flat fee of $30 for ground shipping to all other international countries.
CALL US AT ANY TIME
Live person hours M-F 8am - 4:30pm (323) 426-3520.  After hours leave a voicemail and your call will be returned the next business day.
OR SEND AN EMAIL INSTEAD
Please contact customercare@bleusalt.com with any questions or suggestions. We love hearing from you!
Yes, our signature beechwood fabric really is softer than anything you have felt before.
Experience the new alternative to Cashmere before you purchase.
Enter below for a FREE swatch of the softest fibers on Earth.

settings.text_env_resp:
We feel passionate about being environmentally conscious. As a brand based in Malibu, the ocean is our home. 8 million tons of plastic is dumped into the ocean every single year. Plastics in our oceans never go away and threaten marine life, human health, and the viability of critical marine ecosystems. 

 

We believe in being part of the solution and are proving that luxury clothing can not only be good for you but good for the environment too. In addition to making sustainable apparel, we are working towards being fully zero-waste. It’s our environmental responsibility to do our part and promote positive environmental change.

settings.text: " I live in my Bleusalt and it was a pleasure to design a collection of my own that I could wear all day, every day, whether I'm lounging around the house, going out, or traveling. I hope you enjoy this collection as much as I do. "

settings.title: We are a seasonless line of basics made sustainably 100% in the USA from the softest fibers on Earth

settings.text: The Custom Collection
The Logo Collection
Women Business Travelers

Once A year go someplace your have never been before 

- Dalai Lama

Bleusalt was created out of a need to elevate comfortable pieces, those old ratty sweats and favorite sweater look and make items luxurious enough to wear anywhere.  This is the perfect idea for travel.  The goal is to be as comfortable and put together as possible if you ask us.  Bleusalt pieces provide that by being the softest fibers on earth, designed as seasonless basics that can be mixed and matched or worn head to toe.
Try Bleusalt for your travels: Order 1 Wrap + 1 Top + 1 Bottom and receive 30% off
APRÈS YOGA

Our muse Kelly Chapman Meyer is a devoted yogi who rises before the sun to tune into vibrations which support her passionate belief in clean air, clean water and healthy food for all. As a Trustee of NRDC she brings her energy to fight for a clean environment. As the Cofounder of the AHA Teaching Gardens she brings her heart to help provide education and access to real food in underserved communities. As the Cofounder of the Women’s Cancer Research Fund she has learned the true value of protecting women’s health. How we present ourselves to the world matters. As she dances into the day….she knows that every breath, heartbeat and thought counts. That’s why environmentally friendly, comfortable and chic Bleusalt is a “go to” for work, travel, and life après yoga.
Apres Surf Collection
Once you put the softest fibers on earth onto your bare skin you will never want to take it off. We believe in looking as good as you feel.
Our seasonless line of sustainable basics made from the softest fibers on earth are the perfect way to end your surf session.
